languages.text: {n}Притворно заманив одного из инфоангелов в подготовленный когитатор, слуги Лорд-капитана пленили его и дали сигнал к побиению прочих незваных гостей. Логис-механики уничтожали инфоангелов и схизматикалей с равной беспощадностью.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Притворно заманив одного из инфоангелов в подготовленный когитатор, слуги Лорд-капитана пленили его и дали сигнал к побиению прочих незваных гостей. Логис-механики уничтожали инфоангелов и схизматикалей с равной беспощадностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After luring one of the Info-Angels into the prepared cogitator, the servants of Lord Captain have captured him and gave a signal to destroy the other uninvited guests. The Logis have crushed both the Info-Angels and the Schismaticals with equal ferocity.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the Info-Angels into the prepared cogitator, the servants of Lord Captain have captured him and gave a signal to destroy the other uninvited guests. The Logis have crushed both the Info-Angels and the Schismaticals with equal ferocity.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a preprepared cogitator, the servants of Lord Captain have captured it, sending the signal to destroy the other uninvited guests. The Logis have crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a preprepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants have captured it, sending the signal to destroy the other uninvited guests. The Logis have crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

{n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}领主舰长的仆人引实现准备好了一台陷阱沉思者，将其中一只数据天使诱如其中，将其囚禁，之后发送信号摧毁其他不速之客。技师以一视同仁的冷酷态度，将数据天使和分离者全部化为齑粉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}领主舰长的仆人引实现准备好了一台陷阱沉思者，将其中一只数据天使诱如其中，将其囚禁，之后发送信号摧毁其他不速之客。技师以一视同仁的冷酷态度，将数据天使和分离者全部化为齑粉。{/n}
{n}领主舰长的仆人引诱其中一只数据天使落入预先准备好的沉思者，将其俘虏，之后发送信号摧毁其他不速之客。逻辑士们以同样的冷酷态度，将数据天使和分离者全部化为齑粉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Después de atraer a uno de los ángeles de datos a un cogitador preparado para este propósito, los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán lo aprisionaron y dieron la señal de destruir a los demás invitados indeseados. Los Logos Mecánicos aplastaron tanto a los ángeles de datos como a los cismáticos sin piedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de atraer a uno de los ángeles de datos a un cogitador preparado para este propósito, los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán lo aprisionaron y dieron la señal de destruir a los demás invitados indeseados. Los Logos Mecánicos aplastaron tanto a los ángeles de datos como a los cismáticos sin piedad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あらかじめ用意した考算機に誘い込み、ロード・キャプテンの従者がデータ・エンジェルの1体を捕獲した。他の招かれざる客を破壊する信号を送るためだ。論理学者らはデータ・エンジェルも分裂せし者も、同程度の冷酷さで粉砕した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あらかじめ用意した考算機に誘い込み、ロード・キャプテンの従者がデータ・エンジェルの1体を捕獲した。他の招かれざる客を破壊する信号を送るためだ。論理学者らはデータ・エンジェルも分裂せし者も、同程度の冷酷さで粉砕した。{/n}
{n}あらかじめ用意した考算機に誘い込み、ロード・キャプテンの従者がデータ・エンジェルの1体を捕獲した。他の招かれざる客を破壊する信号を送るためだ。論理学者らはデータ・エンジェルも分裂せし者も、同程度の冷酷さで粉砕した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir attiré l'un des anges numériques dans un cogitateur préparé pour l'occasion, les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} le capturent et envoient le signal valant ordre d'anéantir les autres visiteurs indésirables. Le Logis-Mechanicus écrasent les anges numériques et les schismatiques avec la même application.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir attiré l'un des anges numériques dans un cogitateur préparé pour l'occasion, les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} le capturent et envoient le signal valant ordre d'anéantir les autres visiteurs indésirables. Le Logis-Mechanicus écrasent les anges numériques et les schismatiques avec la même application.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem die Diener des Lord Captains einen der Datenengel in einen eigens dafür vorbereiteten Cogitator gelockt hatten, konnten sie ihn darin einsperren und gaben das Signal, den Rest der ungebetenen Gäste zu zerstören. Die Logis-Mechaniker haben sowohl die Datenengel als auch die Abtrünnigen mit vergleichbarer Gnadenlosigkeit vernichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem die Diener des Lord Captains einen der Datenengel in einen eigens dafür vorbereiteten Cogitator gelockt hatten, konnten sie ihn darin einsperren und gaben das Signal, den Rest der ungebetenen Gäste zu zerstören. Die Logis-Mechaniker haben sowohl die Datenengel als auch die Abtrünnigen mit vergleichbarer Gnadenlosigkeit vernichtet.{/n}

{n}Die Diener des Lord Captains haben einen der Datenengel in einen vorbereiteten Cogitator gelockt und ihn so festgesetzt. Sodann haben sie das Signal für die Zerstörung der anderen ungebetenen Gäste verschickt. Die Logis haben sowohl die Datenengel als auch die Abtrünnigen mit vergleichbarer Gnadenlosigkeit vernichtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârları, veri meleklerinden birini özel olarak tertipledikleri kavramsayara çektikten sonra esir etmeyi başardı ve diğer davetsiz misafirlerin imhası için sinyal verdi. Ardından Logis Mekanikleri, hem veri meleklerini hem de bölücüleri aynı acımasızlıkla ezip geçti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After luring one of the data-angels into a specially prepared cogitator, the Lord Captain's servants imprisoned it and gave the signal to destroy the rest of the uninvited guests. The Logis-Mechanics crushed both the data-angels and the schismaticals with comparable ruthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârları, veri meleklerinden birini özel olarak tertipledikleri kavramsayara çektikten sonra esir etmeyi başardı ve diğer davetsiz misafirlerin imhası için sinyal verdi. Ardından Logis Mekanikleri, hem veri meleklerini hem de bölücüleri aynı acımasızlıkla ezip geçti.{/n}
